Breakout

Status: Finished
Software Used: CLion, GitKraken, GitHub
Languages Used: C++
Textures: Kenney Puzzle 2 Game Assets
Itch.io Page: Zoe Rowbotham - Breakout

Breakout is a small game recreation I made as part of my first year in order to help me learn C++ and the OpenGL Game Framework used in my first year. The game has blocks which when destroyed will give the player points. Special coloured blocks will release power ups that allows the player to shoot bullets for a limited time.

At random points throughout the game, gems will fall from the top to give bonus points. When the ball falls below the paddle, you lose a life.

When the purple bricks are hit, a green power up falls from them. If the player manages to collect the power up (by colliding with it) then they will be able to shoot little stars at the blocks in order to destroy them, as well as the ball. This game can get quite hectic quickly with the ball, shots, gems and power-ups all moving around the screen.
